name: 露西·弗莱 Lucy Fry
intro: Overview (2) Birth Name Lucy Elizabeth Fry Height 5' 9" (1.75 m) Mini Bio (1) Lucy Fry was born as Lucy Elizabeth Fry. She is an actress, known for Vampire Academy (2014), Mako Mermaids (2013) and The Darkness (2016). Trade Mark (2) Tall stature Full lips Trivia (1) Lucy was a runner up in the 2007 Girlfiend Magazine Model Search.
